<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}

Envía vCard con nombre y número.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["number","contact"],"properties":{"number":{"type":"string","example":"51987654321"},"contact":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"number":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
